verses.verse: מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> to bring to remembrance יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אַל־ <WH408> nay בְּקֶצְפְּךָ֥ <WH7110> me not in thy wrath תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <WH3198> rebuke וּֽבַחֲמָתְךָ֥ <WH2534> me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <WH3256> neither chasten
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חִ֭צֶּיךָ <WH2671> For thine arrows נִ֣חֲתוּ <WH5181> stick fast בִ֑י וַתִּנְחַ֖ת <WH5181> presseth me sore עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> in me and thy hand

אֵין־ <WH369> There מְתֹ֣ם <WH4974> [There is] no soundness בִּ֭בְשָׂרִי <WH1320> in my flesh מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <WH2195> of thine anger אֵין־ <WH369> is no שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> neither [is there any] rest בַּ֝עֲצָמַ֗י <WH6106> in my bones מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> because חַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> of my sin

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For עֲ֭וֹנֹתַי <WH5771> For mine iniquities עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> are gone over רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> mine head כְּמַשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> burden כָ֝בֵ֗ד <WH3515> as an heavy יִכְבְּד֥וּ <WH3513> they are too heavy מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> too
הִבְאִ֣ישׁוּ <WH887> stink נָ֭מַקּוּ <WH4743> [and] are corrupt חַבּוּרֹתָ֑י <WH2250> My wounds מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> because אִוַּלְתִּֽי׃ <WH200> of my foolishness

נַעֲוֵ֣יתִי <WH5753> I am troubled שַׁחֹ֣תִי <WH7817> I am bowed down עַד־ <WH5704> over מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> greatly כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> all the day קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> mourning הִלָּֽכְתִּי׃ <WH1980> I go

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כְ֭סָלַי <WH3689> For my loins מָלְא֣וּ <WH4390> are filled נִקְלֶ֑ה <WH7033> with a loathsome וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מְ֝תֹ֗ם <WH4974> [disease] and [there is] no soundness בִּבְשָׂרִֽי׃ <WH1320> in my flesh

נְפוּג֣וֹתִי <WH6313> I am feeble וְנִדְכֵּ֣יתִי <WH1794> broken עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and sore שָׁ֝אַ֗גְתִּי <WH7580> I have roared מִֽנַּהֲמַ֥ת <WH5100> by reason of the disquietness לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> of my heart

אֲ‍ֽדֹנָי <WH136> Lord נֶגְדְּךָ֥ <WH5048> is before כָל־ <WH3605> all תַּאֲוָתִ֑י <WH8378> all my desire וְ֝אַנְחָתִ֗י <WH585> [is] before thee and my groaning מִמְּךָ֥ <WH4480> at לֹא־ <WH3808> is not נִסְתָּֽרָה׃ <WH5641> is not hid

לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> My heart סְ֭חַרְחַר <WH5503> panteth עֲזָבַ֣נִי <WH5800> faileth כֹחִ֑י <WH3581> my strength וְֽאוֹר־ <WH216> me as for the light עֵינַ֥י <WH5869> of mine eyes גַּם־ <WH1571> even הֵ֝֗ם <WH1992> it אֵ֣ין <WH369> also is gone אִתִּֽי׃ <WH854> for

אֹֽהֲבַ֨י ׀ <WH157> My lovers וְרֵעַ֗י <WH7453> and my friends מִנֶּ֣גֶד <WH5048> aloof from נִגְעִ֣י <WH5061> my sore יַעֲמֹ֑דוּ <WH5975> stand וּ֝קְרוֹבַ֗י <WH7138> and my kinsmen מֵרָחֹ֥ק <WH7350> afar off עָמָֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> stand

וַיְנַקְשׁ֤וּ ׀ <WH5367> lay snares מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <WH1245> They also that seek נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> after my life וְדֹרְשֵׁ֣י <WH1875> [for me] and they that seek רָ֭עָתִי <WH7451> my hurt דִּבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> speak הַוּ֑וֹת <WH1942> mischievous things וּ֝מִרְמ֗וֹת <WH4820> deceits כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> all the day יֶהְגּֽוּ׃ <WH1897> and imagine

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I כְ֭חֵרֵשׁ <WH2795> But I as a deaf לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> [man] heard וּ֝כְאִלֵּ֗ם <WH483> not and [I was] as a dumb man לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יִפְתַּח־ <WH6605> [that] openeth פִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> not his mouth

וָאֱהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּ֭אִישׁ <WH376> Thus I was as a man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> does not שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> that heareth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> are no בְּ֝פִ֗יו <WH6310> not and in whose mouth תּוֹכָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8433> [are] no reproofs
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְךָ֣ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God הוֹחָ֑לְתִּי <WH3176> do I hope אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You תַ֝עֲנֶ֗ה <WH6030> thou wilt hear אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> O Lord אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> For I said פֶּן־ <WH6435> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <WH8055> [Hear me] lest [otherwise] they should rejoice לִ֑י בְּמ֥וֹט <WH4131> slippeth רַ֝גְלִ֗י <WH7272> over me when my foot עָלַ֥י <WH5921> against הִגְדִּֽילוּ׃ <WH1431> they magnify
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I לְצֶ֣לַע <WH6761> to halt נָכ֑וֹן <WH3559> For I [am] ready וּמַכְאוֹבִ֖י <WH4341> and my sorrow נֶגְדִּ֣י <WH5048> before תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> [is] continually
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עֲוֹנִ֥י <WH5771> mine iniquity אַגִּ֑יד <WH5046> For I will declare אֶ֝דְאַ֗ג <WH1672> I will be sorry מֵֽחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> for my sin

וְֽ֭אֹיְבַי <WH341> But mine enemies חַיִּ֣ים <WH2416> [are] lively עָצֵ֑מוּ <WH6105> [and] they are strong וְרַבּ֖וּ <WH7231> are multiplied שֹׂנְאַ֣י <WH8130> and they that hate שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> me wrongfully

וּמְשַׁלְּמֵ֣י <WH7999> They also that render רָ֭עָה <WH7451> evil תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> because טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> for good יִ֝שְׂטְנ֗וּנִי <WH7853> are mine adversaries תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> because [רְדֹופִי־ כ] (רָֽדְפִי־ <WH7291> follow טֽוֹב׃ <WH7291> because I follow ק)
אַל־ <WH408> not תַּֽעַזְבֵ֥נִי <WH5800> Forsake יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> me not O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God אַל־ <WH408> not תִּרְחַ֥ק <WH7368> be not far מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at
ח֥וּשָׁה <WH2363> Make haste לְעֶזְרָתִ֑י <WH5833> to help אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> me O Lord תְּשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH8668> my salvation
